name: Nosferatu - Of vampires terrible phantom
description:
My first 3D game. It was made in 6 months as my college work.

I was the 3D prop artist, and did the textures as well.

Credits go to:

Lian  Linsmeyer- 3d animator

Thiago Garulo - Main 2d artist

Camila Kobayashi - Sound and music design

Diego  Baccili - Level designer and Writer

Luigi Nery - Character artist and programer

Felipe Molina- Main Programmer

Natalia Fiore - 2d artist

Guilherme Monteiro de Godoi (me) - env 3d artist
